Events that occurred on 14 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1879 - Author James Branch Cabell is born.
1924 - Voice actor Philip Stone is born.
1946 - The review "Research v. Literature" by J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
1950 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 127.
1954 - Comics writer Charles Dixon is born.
1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 161.
1966 - Actor Lloyd Owen is born.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2510:
Eorl the Young and the Éothéod travel towards the Field of Celebrant.
T.A. 3019:
Last Quarter of the Moon[1]
